item.description:
Our 3rd Annual Pizza Party will once again take place at NEBO (http://www.neborestaurant.com/) We'll begin with a cocktail hour from 6:00-7:00 while the pizzas are being made. I expect to order at least 13 pizzas, ranging from Margherita (mozzarella, tomato sauce, basil) to Montanara (pepperoni, goat cheese, arugala, mozzarella) to Stagione (prosciutto cotto, artichokes, mushrooms, olives, tomato sauce, mozzarella). Just check in with me when you arrive and let me have $6 to cover the cost of the pizzas. You're on your own for drinks- they have a full bar. We'll have the entire front of the restaurant reserved, so you can stand, sit or lean on the bar. After the pizzas have all been eaten, we'll head to Caffe Vittoria for coffee and dessert.

The restaurant is located at 90 North Washington St., diagonally across the street from Joe Tecce's restaurant. North Station or Haymarket would work on the T. The Parcel 7 Garage http://local.yahoo.com/info-10155289-parcel-7-parking-garage-boston would be best for parkers. Please try to join us for a fun night.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar from 6:00-7:00
item.name: NEBO-3rd Annual Pizza Party
